title: BBC Local Live: Nottinghamshire on Monday 5 December 2016 - BBC News
summary: man dies in a52 crash near bingham , road reopens .
police seek double sex attacker in mapperley park .
mansfield 's mr smee proposes on stage at the panto .
news , sport , travel and weather updates will resume at 08:00 tuesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from local live today .
join us again tomorrow .

documents.title: weather : freezing fog warning
text: staying dry but turning increasingly cloudy overnight .
fog patches will form in the evening and persist into tomorrow morning .
some dense freezing fog patches locally , with visibility less than 100m .
the met office has issued a yellow weather warning for fog , in place from 18:00 to 09:00 .
please be aware of likely tricky driving conditions
minimum temperature : 1c ( 34f ) .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: elderly man found with head injuries
text: police have launched an investigation after a 79-year-old man has been found with serious head injuries .
he is in a serious but stable condition at bassetlaw general hospital following an attack in gateford road , worksop in the early hours of saturday .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cricket : hales to find out about england recall
text: nottinghamshire batsman alex hales could be set for an england recall tonight , when the squad is named for the one-day internationals against india .
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: latest headlines for nottinghamshire
text: latest headlines for nottinghamshire
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: have you seen armani tetley ?
text: police have put out an appeal after a 17-year-old girl has gone missing from ollerton .
armani tetley has n't been since saturday evening .
she has links to mansfield and was wearing an olive green coat with fur-trimmed hood and black heeled ankle boots , police said .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: dog 's facelift campaign already raises £ 700
text: of course you want to see a video of handsome hector
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: bus pass elvis campaigning in sleaford
text: looks like clifton 's political renegade bus pass elvis , also known as lord biro , is campaigning hard at the sleaford and north hykeham byelection over in lincolnshire .
pa 's midlands reporter tweets
the seat is vacant after the resignation of conservative stephen phillips last month .
he 's up against nine other candidates on thursday - for a full list click here .
@ buspasselvis also campaigning in sleaford
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: school parents system 'sensationalised '
text: ms chambers said she was `` shocked '' at the reaction to the system .
`` in my playground when i 've been out and about , everyone was really positive about it .
it 's been sensationalised with 'headteacher grades parents ' , '' she said
`` i guess we do in a sense , but it 's grading the partnership . ''
she went on to say the school has had `` fantastic success stories of families that have had these interventions '' - `` it really does make a big difference , '' she added .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: eastwood school not 'ranking ' parents
text: you might have seen a story in the nottingham post and the daily mail today about greasley beuvale school , near eastwood that 's `` ranking '' parents .
well today the headteacher donna chambers has defended the system which she says is about engaging parents .
she insisted the `` parental partnership descriptors '' she gives to parents are not grades .
for those who were not engaging with a child 's learning or with the school , we had a meeting with them to see what we can do , '' she explained .
`` for some , they might work full-time and they may need a parents ' evening at 07:30 , some ca n't access a child 's learning because of their own literacy and numeracy skills . ''
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: post office looking for new location
text: the post office has told me they met today with bargain booze who decided not to go ahead with the plan to have a counter in their store .
for the time being the post office branch will stay where it is on church street but they are actively looking for a new location in stapleford .
author: Dominic Johnson
BBC Radio Nottingham reporter

documents.title: shar-peis bred to have wrinkly faces
text: hector was taken to a council pound where unclaimed animals are sometimes destroyed after a week .
luckily he was taken in by halfway homedog rescue , which has got his tail wagging again .
the centre 's founder , val hosegood , said : `` shar-pei are bred to have these wrinkly faces but in hector 's case the folds are rubbing on his eyes and if not fixed , he will go blind . ''
hector 's treatment could be as high as £ 3,000 so val has turned to fundraising to cover the costs .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: hector the shar-pei needs a facelift
text: meet hector .
he 's a shar-pei and he needs a facelift to save his sight .
seriously .
he came in to bbc nottingham earlier and he was ace .
but his story is a sad one .
he was found as a stray in bradford and was in poor shape - severely underweight and with missing fur .
he was in danger of being put down .
but a newark rescue centre took him in and is raising £ 1,500 so he can be restored to health and re-homed .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: post office move 'would put young people off '
text: the post office began a consultation over whether to move the stapleford branch from church street to a counter inside the bargain booze store in derby road .
local councillor richard mcrae , who started the petition signed by around 200 people , said the venue was `` questionable '' because it would `` put younger people off '' .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: bargain booze 'pulls out ' of post office plan
text: according to broxtowe mp anna soubry , the plan to relocate stapleford 's post office to a bargain booze store in the town is off the table .
residents had been signing a petition against the move .
victory @ twitterid & fellow # stapleford post office campaigners @ twitterid bargain booze pull out we need another location
suggested the health centre they have lots of room
thanks suggested that to post office when we met today .
appalled by abuse you have been suffering of late .
no-one should have to endure these idiots .
do not agree on eu but admire you
does this mean if a new location can not be found there will be no post office .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: a52 now fully open
text: # a52 is now open in both directions following the earlier serious collision between # a1 # grantham and # a46 # saxondale .
no delays .

documents.title: a52 crash : one side opens
text: # a52 @ twitterid investigation work complete and the eastbound carriageway is now open between # saxondale + # grantham .
w/b remains closed .

documents.title: center parcs sex attacker image released
text: do you recognise this man ?
police want to speak to him about an alleged sexual assault at center parcs .
it happened in september but police have only today released the
the assault happened in the sherwood forest resort 's communal changing area .
police said a man was seen standing on a bench peering into a separate cubicle where a woman was getting changed .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakinga52 crash : man dies
text: a man died in the crash on the a52 at bingham this morning , police have confirmed .
a van and a car collided just after 05:00 .
the road was closed in both directions and will remain shut until about 15:00 , police said .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man in 70s 'seriously assaulted '
text: police have attended an alleged `` serious assault '' on an elderly male in worksop this afternoon .
author: Worksop Guardian

documents.title: sex attacks in mapperley park
text: two sexual assaults took place in mapperley park last week within 12 hours of each other .
a woman was `` touched inappropriately '' at about 17:00 on thursday and a second woman was at 05:30 the following morning , police said .
both were in the mansfield road/redcliffe road area .
police are looking for a `` stocky '' white youth , aged between 15 and 20 , who was wearing a blue adidas tracksuit .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : sunny spells
text: dry and fine with some decent sunny spells for the vast majority .
however , there is the risk of a couple of isolated fog patches .
cold with highs of only 4c ( 39f ) .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: arrests after warsop pub attack
text: a 37-year-old man is being treated in hospital for serious facial injuries after a being attacked in the beer garden of a warsop pub in the early hours of sunday .
it happened at the talbot and continued in high street at about 12.05am
the 37-year-old , who 's at the qmc , received injuries that are n't life threatening , police said .
two men , aged 39 and 21 , who were arrested on sus of causing grievous bodily harm , have been bailed .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: panto proposal bride-to-be was on bgt
text: karen tomkins - the future mrs smee - got to the semi-finals of britain 's got talent in 2011 .
what a showbiz couple !
she was one half of an illusionist double act
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: smee 's fiancee shows off ring
text: to adam 's relief , she said yes .
`` if she had said no it would have gone viral and that would have been awkward , '' he said .
very awkward indeed .
almost as awkward as being photobombed by a pirate
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: will you marry smee ?
text: this definitely was n't in the script
during the panto performance of peter pan at mansfield palace theatre , the actor playing smee got down on one knee to propose to his girlfriend .
adam moss told the audience he was going to give a present to his girlfriend karen tomkins during the show on friday .
following inevitable cries of `` it 's behind you '' from the audience , karen turned round to find mr moss on one knee
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: extra dates to visit wonderland added
text: this christmas will be the first without tony 's mum , who died from cancer in march , shortly after he was treated for cancer himself .
he said the winter wonderland had given him something positive to focus on .
and he 's already planning a bigger and better winter wonderland for next year , which will include a walk-in igloo .
if you want to see the wonderland , tony has added extra dates , due to the demand , so get in touch through his facebook page .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: wonderland dad : we 're a bit christmas crazy
text: but would you turn your home into a winter wonderland for the local kids ?
`` my family are all a bit christmas crazy , '' said the 45-year-old .
`` my wife has probably got the biggest burden because she has got to tolerate it all . ''
but his one-year-old daughter `` loves all the lights '' , while his three-year-old daughter `` thinks it 's absolutely amazing '' .
his 16-year-old son is helping him by dressing as an elf .
poor thing
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: dad 's grotto an emotional experience
text: here 's a miniature replica of the coca-cola christmas truck at this incredible winter wonderland in retford we mentioned earlier
tony mcmanus , who 's created it , said one young visitor was so overcome by emotion she `` came out of the grotto in tears '' .
he 's not charging for entry to visit the attraction - just asking for donations towards buying a `` roving '' defibrillator which the pe teacher will take to the 10 schools he works at .
he 's raised £ 300 in just four days !
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: panthers four clear of bottom of league
text: nottingham panthers suffered a second defeat to sheffield in two days as they were beaten 6-1 in south yorkshire .
logan macmillan scored the panthers ' goal , and the defeat leaves them 18 points off the top and four clear of the bottom of the elite league .
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: makeshift wonderland attracts 110 families
text: makeshift wonderland attracts 110 families

documents.title: bike thefts : '£ 1.5m crimewave '
text: you 've been having your say on twitter about the bbc investigation that 's revealed 10,000 bikes were stolen in notts in the last five years .
even at £ 150 a bike , this is a £ 1.5m crimewave , plus some have bikes on finance , still paying for them , ca n't get to college/work etc
author: Twitter

documents.title: police still 'watching ' for any trouble at football
text: supt holland has said the force `` maintain a watching brief '' but have not felt the need to attend every game this season .
he has also praised the club for their help in identifying troublemakers .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: football hooligan problem 'under control , ' police say
text: you might remember earlier this year the police told bbc radio nottingham about an `` emerging '' hooligan problem at notts county .
i 've just spoken to supt mark holland , who is head of football policing in nottinghamshire , and he 's said he feels the force has now `` taken the head '' off the problem .
he has cited people facing court action and bans by the club and police as reasons .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: frosty notts in
text: another morning scraping the car ?
some great of frozen nottinghamshire have been coming in

kirkby-in-ashfield
bilsthorpe
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: bike thefts 'small proportion of bike users '
text: nottinghamshire police have said that while they 're concerned by the number of bicycle thefts , it 's a relatively small proportion of the number of people using bikes .
inspector rob wilson said , while many thefts are opportunist , some bikes are stolen to order .
`` people run a form of business in having bikes stolen and selling them on , '' he said .
`` we use decoy bikes , often with an electronic trackers in them so we can track the bike and identify it as well . ''
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

delays in the area should begin to ease now .

documents.title: 10,000 bike thefts in notts in five years
text: ever had your bike stolen ?
it 's not a nice feeling .
and it seems you 're unlikely to get it back , according to figures obtained by the bbc today .
ten thousand bicycles have been stolen in nottinghamshire over the last five years .
and only 6 % of those crimes end up in a summons , conviction , caution or other resolution .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : m1 blocked
text: there 's stationary traffic on the m1 southbound between junctions 26 and 25 currently because of an accident .
here 's the view from the camera at j26
and police appear to be working to clear the accident a little further down
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: notts county-peterborough highlights
text: if you missed the game , catch up here
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: forest and county await fa cup draw
text: nottingham forest and notts county fans will both be keeping an eye on the fa cup third round draw tonight after notts fought back from 2-0 down to peterborough to force a 2-2 draw and a replay .
adam campbell and louis laing scored the goals at meadow lane and the magpies or posh will be ball number 52 in tonight 's draw , with forest number 29 .
it 's live on bbc2 from 19:00 .
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: ice on tram lines causes delays
text: the lack of tram service between hucknall and moor bridge is down to ice on the overhead lines , according to net .
`` all our passengers wishing to get to hucknall can use the rainbow 3 buses or trains from bulwell , '' the firm said on facebook .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : a52 diversions
text: if you 're about to head off towards bingham , here 's the latest diversion information from highways england
if you 're travelling eastbound , you 'll be diverted on to the a46 northbound towards newark to join the a1 southbound to meet the a52 at grantham .
if you 're travelling westbound you 'll be sent up the a1 northbound at grantham to newark and down the a46 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: police trying to inform loved ones
text: detective sergeant , ged hazelwood , said the a52 could remain closed until lunchtime .
it 's not been confirmed that anyone has died in the crash but he had this to say this morning .
`` the top priority is treatment of injured parties and then we need to identify people with a view to informing loved ones , '' he said .
`` we are still in process of trying to inform loved ones and we are still investigating it forensically . ''
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: a52 crash : bus delays
text: a52 shut near saxondale island .
# rushcliffemainline cant go further than bingham at present , and likely delays to that & # rushcliffevillager

# a52 is closed in both directions between the a46 ( saxondale ) and the a1 ( grantham ) due to a serious collision .
@ twitterid on scene .

apologies .
if is , of course , our colleagues from @ twitterid on scene not northamptonshire .

the incident is located btwn the saxondale/nottingham rd roundabout and the tithby rd junctions .
all other roads in are open .
thank you please keep us updated

documents.title: travel : problems on the trams
text: update .
we still have no service between hucknall and moor bridge .
trent barton and east mids trains are accepting our tickets .
are you going to qmc ?
yes emma from all stops except hucknall and moor bridge .
sorry for any inconvenience .
stick a bit of de-icer on it i 'm joking lol

i 've not left the house yet .
just wondered if it was worth leaving if i ca n't get to qmc .
the problems are just between hucknall and moor bridge emma .
yeah i 'm going from hucknall and my back kills these days going on a bus .
ok emma sorry for any inconvenience , if you have a tram pass they are accepting them on the threes .

into the city roy sorry for any inconvenience .
well your chap at hucknall was telling people to get off at bulwell , so droves of us did then stood in the cold for 15mins

documents.title: travel : a52 closed at bingham
text: the a52 has been closed around bingham after a crash between a car and a lorry at about 05:00 this morning .
diversions have been put in place .
police are describing it as a `` serious '' collision .
author: BBC Travel
